pageContext.claim: “The disastrous IG Report on James Comey shows, in the strongest of terms, how unfairly I, and tens of millions of great people who support me, were treated. Our rights and liberties were illegally stripped away by this dishonest fool. We should be given our stolen time back?”
pageContext.analysis: The FBI and special counsel investigation into Trump's campaign and Russian election interference was upheld as legal by various judges. Special counsel Robert Mueller documented several instances of Trump potentially obstructing justice during the probe.
